comment.text: This translation key is used to display the status of a user in various parts of the application. It appears as "Status" next to the user's current state in the SettingsPluginDialog and as part of the user information panel. Its purpose is to provide a clear understanding of the user's current status, helping users navigate and understand their account settings or quotas effectively.

usage.context:
const statusItems = [
 {
 id: "filter_status-user",
 key: "filter-status",
 group: "filter-status",
 label: t("People:UserStatus"),
 isHeader: true,
 },
 {
 id: "filter_status-active",
 key: EmployeeStatus.Active,

const trigger = getTriggerTranslate(eventDetails.trigger, t);
 
 return (
 <BarWrapper>
 <BarItem>
 <BarItemHeader>{t("People:UserStatus")}</BarItemHeader>
 <FlexWrapper>
 <StatusBadge status={eventDetails.status} />
 </FlexWrapper>
 </BarItem>
 <BarItem>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'තත්‍වය' (tathvaya) translates to 'reality' or 'truth,' which is not an accurate translation of 'Status.' 'Status' refers to a state or condition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'స్థితి' (sthiti) which translates to 'status' or 'condition' in Sinhala, or 'ឋានៈ' (thana) which is a more formal word for 'status'.
